Container.Name: MeshMonitor
Container.Overview:
MeshMonitor is a comprehensive monitoring and management platform for Meshtastic mesh networks. It provides real-time visualization, message history, telemetry tracking, and node management capabilities for your Meshtastic devices.
Features: - Real-time mesh network visualization - Message history and search - Node telemetry and health monitoring - Multi-channel support - Position tracking with map integration - Notification system (100+ providers via Apprise) - Auto-upgrade capability - RESTful API access - Web-based management interface
IMPORTANT: You must have a Meshtastic node with WiFi/Ethernet and HTTP API enabled to use this application.
PERMISSIONS: The container automatically detects and fixes permission issues on startup. If permission errors occur, check the container logs for instructions.
Container.Requires: Requires a Meshtastic node with WiFi/Ethernet and HTTP API enabled. Network access to the node is required.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Web interface port

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Persistent data storage for database, logs, and configuration

Config.Name: Meshtastic Node IP
Config.Description: IP address of your Meshtastic node (REQUIRED)

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Random 32-byte hex string for session security. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32. Optional - auto-generates if not provided (sessions reset on container restart)

Config.Name: Allowed Origins
Config.Description: CORS allowed origins. ONLY set this if you get CORS errors or blank pages. Examples: http://192.168.1.50:8080 or https://meshmonitor.yourdomain.com. Leave EMPTY for default (works for most cases)

Config.Name: Node Environment
Config.Description: Application environment (production recommended)

Config.Name: Trust Proxy
Config.Description: Enable if using reverse proxy (nginx, swag, etc.)

Config.Name: Cookie Secure
Config.Description: Set to true if using HTTPS (required for secure deployments)

Config.Name: Cookie SameSite
Config.Description: Cookie SameSite policy (lax recommended)

Config.Name: Meshtastic TCP Port
Config.Description: TCP port on your Meshtastic node (default: 4403)

Config.Name: Meshtastic Use TLS
Config.Description: Enable TLS for Meshtastic connection

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Container timezone (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London)

Config.Name: Database Path
Config.Description: SQLite database file path (default should not be changed)

Config.Name: Disable Anonymous Access
Config.Description: Set to true to require authentication for all access

Config.Name: Admin Username
Config.Description: Username for the admin user

Config.Name: Base URL
Config.Description: Base URL path if deploying in subfolder (e.g., /meshmonitor). Leave empty for root deployment.

Config.Name: Session Max Age
Config.Description: Session duration in milliseconds (default: 24 hours)

Config.Name: Enable Access Logs
Config.Description: Enable HTTP access logging

Config.Name: Access Log Path
Config.Description: Path to access log file

Config.Name: Apprise Config Directory
Config.Description: Directory for Apprise notification configurations

Config.Name: Apprise Stateful Mode
Config.Description: Apprise stateful mode (simple or disabled)

Config.Name: Enable Virtual Node
Config.Description: Enable virtual node server for testing (requires additional port mapping)
